mcbj.Histogram.calc_corr_hist_2d¶

Histogram.calc_corr_hist_2d()¶

Calculate correlation matrix

\[C_{i,j}=C(G_i,G_j)=\frac{\left< (N_i(r)-\left< N_i(r)\right> )\cdot (N_j(r)-\left< N_j(r)\right> ) \right>}{\sqrt{\left<(N_i(r)-\left<N_i(r)\right>)^2\right>\cdot \left<(N_j(r)-\left<N_j(r)\right>)^2\right>}},\]

where \(N_{i}(r)\) is the \(i\) th bin of the single histogram of trace \(r\) and \(N_{j}(r)\) is the \(j\) th bin of the single histogram of trace \(r\)

Returns:

MCBJ STM-BJ
